#summary Program features

= Introduction =

This application was written because I wanted to automatically synchronize my music folder in Wuala to my Android phone. Currently there is no full featured Wuala client for android, so here is a lightweight client using Wuala web API.


= Details =

Some features provides by the application:
  * Configure Wuala web URL and key as the synchronization source
  * Files are synchronized to Music folder on the phone
  * Synchronization process runs in background, every 1 hour
  * Graphical interface displaying synchronization progress
  * Does not ask for your Wuala username or password!
